summary: This document is a mortgage loan application correspondence addressed to Brian Vickers from Joann Brown, a mortgage loan originator. It includes a request for Vickers to review the enclosed documents related to his mortgage loan application and offers assistance with any questions he may have.

persons.name: Brian Vickers
persons.context: Brian Vickers is the recipient of the mortgage loan application correspondence.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is the sender of the correspondence and is responsible for assisting with the mortgage loan application process.

keyFacts: The document is a mortgage loan application correspondence dated December 5, 2014.
Joann Brown is identified as the mortgage loan originator.
Brian Vickers is the applicant for the mortgage loan.
The correspondence invites Vickers to review enclosed documents and offers assistance.
The document mentions that loans are subject to credit review and approval.
